newstate.name: NewState
newstate.text: [PH] You do not have the required resources to research this technology

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(RequiredParentsNumber == 0, Format("%s:", Loc("technology_required")), GetIfElse(RequiredParentsNumber - ResearchedParents > 1, Format("%s:", Format(Loc("technology_x_required"), RequiredParentsNumber - ResearchedParents)), Format("%s:", Loc("technology_1_required"))))
